Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: Thu Sep 6 15:25:37 2018 +0200 committer Alessandro Sorniotti Tue Sep 11 10:42:41 2018 +0200 FAB-11896 Exercise v1.2 and v1.3 validation in tests FAB-11551 introduces a split in the validation logic based on whether the channel operates with a 1.2 or 1.3 capability. This change set extends the validation logic to test with either validator and assert that the behaviour either doesn't change or it changes as expected. Change-Id: I85179703db696c71ed272cd0237f14fde12101fb Signed-off-by: Alessandro Sorniotti Signed-off-by: Matthias Neugschwandtner {code} >

Action.author: harsha544
Action.body: Sure - so that should have been marked a dup of this. Not sure why it went the other way... It's the Jira view that's causing this conflict. Post marking FAB-11971 as dup. of FAB-11968, it's auto closed. Thank you !! Will be keeping a close eye on this. >
